
# Coding Exercise

## Exercise Goals

- Increase Topic Mastery
- Construct Knowledge
- Give you data to evaluate how well you are learning.

## Task

Duplicate the following program. Run it successfully.

## Program

```cpp
// 1-1.cpp - My First C++ Program
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string name = "Your Name";    // First and Last name
    int year = 2026;              // Put the current year here
    
    // Process variables
    cout << "Hello, World!" << endl;
    cout << "My name is " << name << endl;
    cout << "Welcome to C++ Programming!" << endl;
    cout << "The year is " << year << endl;
    
    return 0;
}

```
